CustomField.formula:
/* IF( ISPICKVAL(WorkType.GDMFSL_WorkType_Category__c,'PM'), (Asset.Quantity * DurationInMinutes) , DurationInMinutes) */
IF( ISPICKVAL(WorkType.GDMFSL_WorkType_Category__c,'PM'), IF(ISNULL( AssetId ) , DurationInMinutes, (Asset.Quantity * DurationInMinutes)) , DurationInMinutes)
CustomField.label: Total Duration (in Minutes)
